attributes.action: Make a national men’s day as women have one and we don’t
attributes.additional_details: I wish for a national day for men ygm
attributes.background: Make a calendar date for a national men’s day as women have a day of nationalism

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

International Men's Day is observed on the 19th November. You can find out more information in this House of Commons Library Research Briefing:
https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/cdp-2020-0138/

A debate on the topic of International Men's Day was also held in the House of Commons on the 19th November 2020:
https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2020-11-19/debates/FF3FD025-D6F1-4872-84A1-09FBFDA4E4A0/InternationalMen%E2%80%99SDay
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
